title: Goblet of the White City (SPD) (0SPD1)
text:
Set:	Promotional
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Bearer must be a [Gondor] companion. Each time you move to a site, bearer is strength +1 until the end of the game. At the start of your fellowship phase, discard 2 random cards from hand or discard this possession.
Rarity:	SPD
Notes:	Saint Patrick's Day Promo for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
